Mr. Badral, 45 years old, lives with his two sons in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in an old wooden house on a plot of land. He has been running a grocery store for three years. His elder son began to work as an information technology engineer at a private company last year. 

The house they live in has deteriorated over the years and needs some renovation. So Badral is requesting a loan of 6,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam. Using those materials, he can repair and insulate his house. The renovated house will enable the family to reduce their coal consumption thus releasing fewer pollutants into the air and contributing to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Sarantuya

texts.en:
Mrs. Sarantuya, 48 years old, lives with her mother and two children in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. Three months ago, she began working as an accountant at a trade company. Before this job, she, together with her daughter, have been renting two stalls and selling goods at a trade center. Her son sells equipment to local people. 

She is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to import equipment and spare parts for automobiles from a Chinese border city in order to increase the family income and so that her son can sell those imported goods at a higher price and make a profit from the mark-up in order to improve his living standard. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who wants to see her son and daughter to live successfully and happily.

loans.use: to import equipment and spare parts

loans.name: Abdulkhair

texts.ru: Абдулхайр житель района Хамадони. Ему 49 лет. Он женат и является отцом шестерых детей. У него трое дочерей и трое сыновей. Его младшая дочь учится в средней школе, а остальным детям старше 18 лет. Жена Абдулхайра не работает, она ведет домашнее хозяйство. У Абдулхайра среднее техническое образование. Он работает шофером грузовой машины марки КАМАЗ. На своей машине он перевозит песок и гравий. Он уже 10 лет занимается этим делом и любит свою работу. Абдулхайр в данный момент нуждается в кредите. У его машины имеются технические неполадки. Он хочет купить запасные части машины, отремонтировать свой грузовой транспорт и продолжить свою деятельность. Он будет очень признателен за поддержку.
texts.en:
Abdulkhair is an inhabitant of the Hamadoni region. He is 49 years old. He is married and is the father of six children. He has three daughters and three sons. His youngest daughter is in hihg school, and the rest of the children are over the age of 18. Abdulkhair's wife does not work; she runs the household. 

Abdulkhair has a technical high school education. He works as a truck driver for KAMAZ. In his vehicle, he carries sand and gravel. He has ten years experience in this business and loves his job. 

Abdulkhair is currently in need of a loan. His vehicle has technical problems. He wants to buy spare parts, repair his freight truck, and to continue his work. He is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for repairing freight vehicles in order to continue activities

loans.name: Rovilla

texts.en: Rovilla is married  and lives in Bitibut, Sapang Dalaga with her family. Rovilla owns and operates a business buying and selling used clothes such as shorts, blouses, etc. She established the business as a way of generating extra income of 3,600 PHP per month. Aside from this business, she also has had a general store selling groceries in their community. Rovilla requested a loan of 15,000 PHP from GDMPC to buy rice and corn grits for resale. She wants to purchase motorcycles to be used in her business in future.

loans.use: to buy rice and corn grits for sale

loans.name: Ayitcheme 3 Group

texts.fr: Le groupement AYITCHEME 3 est formé de dix neuf personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier et appartiennent à une même association. La représentante de ce groupe, Ayébahi, celle dont la main est levée sur la photo est âgée de 55 ans. Ayébahi est mariée à un certain Soglo et a trois enfants, tous à sa charge. Ayébahi n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Ayébahi prépare de la bouillie de maïs accompagnée de pâté (à base de farine de blé et du sucre), qu'elle vend dans une école du Bénin. Parallèlement à cette activité, Ayébahi vend d'autres produits divers ; ce qui lui permet de mieux subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants. Il y a environs quatre ans que Ayébahi exerce cette activité. Ayébahi s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. En vue de rehausser le niveau de son activité, Ayébahi ambitionne agrandir son stock de vente ; ce qui lui permettra de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour ce faire, Ayébahi sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement AYITCHEME 3, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group "AYITCHEME 3" is composed of nineteen persons who live in the same district and who belong to the same association. The group's representative, Ayébahi, who is the one in the photo with her hand raised, is 55 years old and married to a man named Soglo. She has three children, all in her care. 

Ayébahi did not attend school. She makes cornmeal porridge served with pâté (made from wheat flour and sugar) that she sells at a school in Benin. Concurrent to this business, Ayébahi sells a variety of other goods, and this enables her to do better in supporting her children. Ayébahi has been in this business for about four years. She gets her supplies  from a market in Benin. 

With the aim of boosting her business, Ayébahi has the ambition to expand her inventory, which will enable her to respond better to the requirements of her customer. To do so, Ayébahi is requesting, along with the other members of the group AYITCHEME 3, a loan from ALIDé

loans.use: to purchase corn, sugar, vegetable oil, etc.

loans.name: Reparation De Ouanaminthe Group

texts.fr:
Dieudonne est le coordinatrice de son groupe Reparation de Ouanaminthe. Elle est mariée, elle a 1 enfants. Dieudonne habite dans la région nord est d`Haïti ou de électricité est rare et de l’eau portable est très limitee. Elle dirige son commerce de vente de produits divers et d'accessoires pendant plus d'une dizaine d' annee. Avant de se commercer elle était une couturiere. 

Dieudonné va investir votre prêt lors de l'achat des sandales pour la revente, cosmetiques, vetements etc. Elle espère que cet emprunt l’aidera a grandir son commerce. Des autres membres du groupe Reparation de Ouanaminthe ont besoin d’un emprunt pour le commerce que ventes cosmétiques, boissons gazeuses, chaussures, vetement, etc. Dieudonne déclare que son défit principal est de devenir une grande commerçante et dit son but principal c’est d’avoir un grand commerce qui lui facilitera a construire une grande maison avec l’aide d’Esperanza Int.
texts.en:
Dieudonné is the coordinator of her group Reparation de Ouanaminthe. She is married and has one child. Dieudonné lives in northern Haiti, where electricity is rare and potable water is very limited. She has been running her business selling various goods and accessories for over ten years. Before starting off, she used to be a dressmaker. 

Dieudonné is going to invest your loan by buying sandals, cosmetics, clothing, etc. to resell. She hopes that his loan will help her to expand her business. Other members of the group Reparation de Ouanaminthe have need of a loan for businesses selling goods such as cosmetics, soft drinks, shoes, clothing, etc. Dieudonné states that her main challenge is to have a large business that will facilitate building a large house for her, with the help of Esperanza Int.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of products, such as shoes, clothing, and beverages, to sell

loans.name: Sabougnouma I Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe   SABOUGNOUMA I sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  43 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à TIGUIYA, un des villages de la Sous-Préfecture de KOLONDIEBA, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec DJENEBA  1ère assise à droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter   2 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village  et à  KOLONDIEBA   après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 145.500FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Sabougnouma I group are married women, who average 43 years of age with five children each and who all live in polygamous families in Tiguiya, one of the villages in the sub-prefecture of Kolondieba, Mali's third administrative region.

They are collaborating with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, with the aim of carrying out their farming activities successfully during the winter season. They are on their eighth loan with the institution and the previous loans have been repaid in full.

Djeneba, who is sitting on the far right of the photo, grows groundnut. With her loan, she is planning to buy fertilizers and seeds as well as to pay for labor to farm two hectares of land.

Once harvested, the produce is sold in the village and in Kolondieba to a customer base made up of men and women.

Djeneba is expecting to make a profit of 145,500FCFA per season. This profit will enable her to repay her loan and also to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds, as well as to pay for labor for the farming season.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.fr: Emmanuel est  une jeune homme de 26 ans mariée père de 1 enfant. Après sa formation, il a ouvert un petit atelier de couture qui fonctionne bien depuis 4 ans déjà, son activité fonnctionne mais il n'a pas tout le matériel necessire pour aller plus vite avec ses commandes et pouvoir satisfaire sa clientèle à temps. C'est pour celà qu'il sollicite un crédit pour s'acheter des tissus et le petit matériel de coutures (épingles, aiguilles, doublure, fil...) qui l'évitera d'aller au marché tout le temps, il pourra coudre et revendre à ses clients. Le bénéfice tiré de ce crédit lui permettra non seulement de s'acheter son petit matériel de couture pour agrandir son activité, mais aussi de satisfaire certains de ses besoins ainsi que ceux de sa petite famille.
texts.en: Emmanuel is a young man, who is 26 years old, married and father to one child. After his training, he opened a small sewing workshop which has been doing well for the past four years. However, he does not have the necessary materials to carry out his orders more quickly and satisfy customer demand on a timely basis. For this reason he is requesting a loan so that he can buy fabrics and sewing materials (pins, needles, lining, thread..) and avoid going to the market all the time, so that he can just sew and resell to his customers. The profit he makes from this loan will enable him not only to buy sewing materials to expand his activity, but also to satisfy some of his own and his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy fabric and sewing materials.

loans.name: Saleteisa

texts.en:
Saleteisa is a 56-year-old widowed woman with two children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro, bananas etc., to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Saleteisa has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, a pickaxe, files and barbed wire.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Saleteisa hopes to supply her family's everyday needs.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, a pickaxe, files and barbed wire.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Ii Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe  SABOUGNOUMA II sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  44 ans, 5enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à TIGUIYA, un des villages de la Sous-Préfecture de KOLONDIEBA, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide avec FANTA  assise au milieu sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  3 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village et à  KOLONDIEBA   après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 195.500FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the group called SABOUGNOUMA II are married women with an average age of 44 and  on average, five children, all living in polygamous families in  Tiguiya, one of the villages of the Sous-Préfecture of KOLONDIEBA, third administrative region of Mali. 
 
They collaborate with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso so as to succeed in their agricultural activities during the rainy season. They are on their eighth loan with the institution, prior loans having been correctly reimbursed. 

Fanta, sitting in the middle in the photo, grows peanuts. With her loan she intends to buy farm inputs, seeds, and pay plowing fees to cultivate three hectares. Her produce is sold in the village and in Kolondieba, after the harvest, to a clientele composed of men and women. 

She expects to make a profit of 195,500 F CFA each season. This profit will permit her to repay her loan and also to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, seeds, and pay fees for plowing for this growing season.

loans.name: Leny

texts.en:
Leny is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 11 years. Leny earns additional income from raising chickens.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional ingredients like meat, hotdogs, etc., to sell for her food vending business.

Leny has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like meat, hotdogs, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Ayitcheme 1 Group

texts.fr: AYITCHEME 1est un groupement de neuf personnes, dont les membres vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Kèmi (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est mariée à un certain Richard. Le couple a trois enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Kèmi et son mari vivent ensemble avec les enfants et assurent ensemble les différentes charges des enfants. Kèmi n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Il y a trois ans que Kèmi mène comme activité la vente de fruits et des condiments de façon secondaire. Kèmi exerce cette activité passionnément, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Kèmi s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin et revend ses produits à son domicile. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d’augmenter son fonds de roulement, Kèmi sollicite un crédit avec les autres membres du groupement AYITCHEME 1. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en:
"AYITCHEME 1" is a group of nine persons whose members live in the same district. The group's representative, Kèmi (whose hand is raised in the photo) is married to a man named Richard. The couple have three children, not all in school but all in their care. Kèmi and her husband live together with the children and jointly ensure that the different expenses of the children are covered. 

For three years, Kèmi has been running a business selling fruits and also condiments on the side. She works at her business with passion, and this enables her to meet her needs and those of her children. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin and sells her goods out of her home. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her working capital, Kèmi along with the other members of the group AYITCHEME 1 are requesting a loan, which will be used to respond better to the demands of their customers and to make more profit.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and condiments to sell

loans.name: Amigos Por Siempre Calle Chimborazo  (Montecristi) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Amigos Por siempre Calle Chimborazo  se reúne cada quince días en Montecristi,  conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

Este Banco Comunal está integrado por 10 mujeres y 2 hombres,  este es un grupo personas muy humildes y trabajadoras que al enterarse de los beneficios que les brinda la institución decidieron unirse  y formar este grupo el cual les ha ayudado mucho para salir adelante. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como la artesanía, comercio en general, entre otras actividades.
 
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Narcisa y tiene 49 años, hace varios años su esposo falleció pero de esa relación tiene 6 hijos, 4 de ellos mayores de edad y dos de 15 y 10 años que estudian en colegio y escuela, tres de ellos aun viven con ella. 

Doña Narcisa tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, es bien surtida con muchos productos de primera necesidad y productos de bazar y papelería,  en su negocio sus clientes encuentran de todo razón por lo cual su clientela es muy buena y fiable y ella por su parte les brinda el mejor servicio.  Lleva en el negocio más de 10 años negocio que compartía con su querido esposo cuando él estaba vivo y que ahora es la única fuente de ingresos que ella tiene para sacar adelante a sus hijos y a ella misma.

Este crédito es para comprar víveres para surtir su tienda. Lleva de 2 ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta  la ayuda que le dan los créditos. 

Su sueño es darles lo mejor  a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Amigos Por siempre Calle Chimborazo" meets every 15 days in Montecristi which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts, renowned both nationally and internationally.  It is also where the famous Panama hat is from.

The group is comprised of ten women and two men who are humble, hard-working people who decided to join together to help each other get ahead when they found out about the benefits offered by the institution.  They are involved in different business activities such as crafts, commerce and other activities.
 
One of the members of the group is Narcisa who is 49 year old.  Several years ago her husband passed away and of their six children, four are adults and two, ages 15 and ten, attend school.  Three of the children still live at home.

Narcisa runs a grocery store at home and stocks many essential grocery products as well as bazaar and stationery goods.  Her customers can find anything they are looking for at the store so they are very good and loyal; and she gives them the best customer service possible.  Narcisa has been in business for ten years and used to share it with her husband when he was alive.  Now it is her only source of income to provide for herself and her children.

This loan is to buy more groceries for her store.  She has been involved with the communal bank for two loan cycles and likes the fact that the loans are very helpful to her.  Her goal is to give the best she can to her children.

loans.use: To buy groceries.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Iii Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe SABOUGNOUMA III sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  33 ans, 4enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à TIGUIYA, un des villages de la Sous-Préfecture de KOLONDIEBA, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec BINTOU  debout au milieu sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  1hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village et à  KOLONDIEBA   après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 85.500FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Sabougnouma III group are married women, who average 33 years of age with four children each and who all live in polygamous families in Tiguiya, one of the villages in the sub-prefecture of Kolondieba, Mali's third administrative region.

They are collaborating with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, with the aim of carrying out their farming activities successfully during the winter season. They are on their eighth loan with the institution and the previous loans have been repaid in full.

Bintou, who is standing in the middle of the photo, grows groundnut. With her loan, she is planning to buy fertilizers and seeds as well as to pay for labor to farm a hectare of land.

Once harvested, the produce is sold in the village and in Kolondieba to a customer base made up of men and women.

Bintou is expecting to make a profit of 85,500FCFA per season. This profit will enable her to repay her loan and also to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds and to pay for labor for the farming season.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Iv Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe   SABOUGNOUMA IV sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  39 ans, 4enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à TIGUIYA, un des villages de la Sous-Préfecture de KOLONDIEBA, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec DJENEBOU 1ère debout à droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  1hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village et à  KOLONDIEBA   après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 120.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Sabougnouma IV group are married women, who average 39 years of age with four children each and who all live in polygamous families in Tiguiya, one of the villages in the sub-prefecture of Kolondieba, Mali's third administrative region.

They are collaborating with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, with the aim of carrying out their farming activities successfully during the winter season. They are on their eighth loan with the institution and the previous loans have been repaid in full.

Djenebou, who is standing on the far right of the photo, grows groundnut. With her loan, she is planning to buy fertilizers and seeds as well as to pay for labor to farm a hectare of land.

Once harvested, the produce is sold in the village and in Kolondieba to a customer base made up of men and women.

Djenebou is expecting to make a profit of 120,000FCFA per season. This profit will enable her to repay her loan and also to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds and to pay for labor for the farming season.

loans.name: Anvar

texts.ru: Анвар 57-летний житель района Носири Хисрав. У него есть жена и один взрослый сын. Его сын женат и имеет одного ребенка. Они живут вместе всей семьей. Анвар работает секретарем джамоата. Сейчас он хотел бы начать собственный бизнес. Он собирается заниматься животноводством и совмещать со своей работой. Анвар планирует вначале закупать по одному крупнорогатому скоту, откармливать в течение одного месяца и затем продавать на местном скотном рынке. У Анвара во дворе есть коровник, а также Анвар имеет стартовый капитал в размере 400 TJS. Ему в бизнесе будет помогать жена, в его отсутствии (когда он будет находиться на работе) его жена будет присматривать за скотом. Анвар обратился за кредитом для закупа теленка и его корма, чтобы начать бизнес.
texts.en:
Anvar is a 57-year-old resident of the Nosiri Khisrav region. He has a wife and one adult son. His son is married and has one small child. They all live together as a family. Anvar works as local (djamoata) secretary. 

Now he would like to start his own business. He is going to engage in cattle breeding and to combine this with his work. Anvar at the start plans to buy one head of cattle, to fatten it up over the course of a month, and then to resell it at the local cattle market. Anvar has a barn in his yard and starting capital of 400 TJS. In the business, he will be helped by his wife. While he is at work, she will look after the cattle. Anvar applied for a loan to purchase a calf and its feed in order to start the business.

loans.use: to purchase one head of cattle and its feed in order to start cattle breeding activities

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is 59 years old and lives in Libertad, Sapang Dalaga. She is married and the mother of two children. 

Thelma has a banana and snack food vending business to earn a living. She has been in this type of business for more than 30 years. 

Recently, Thelma has requested a new loan of 5,000 PHP from GDMPC to purchase raw ingredients.

In the future, Thelma hopes to expand her snack vending business and be able to open a 'sari sari' store.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients

loans.name: Onon

texts.en:
Mr. Onon, 60 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. His other three children all got married and live separately from their parents. He has been working as a repairman at a hospital for more than eleven years and accumulated a vast amount of experience in fixing pipes. His wife has retired from work and gets a state pension. 

The house they live in has deteriorated over the years and it needs some serious repair. So he is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam. Using those materials, he and his son can repair and insulate their old house making it far more comfortable and a warm place. The renovated house will enable the family to burn less coal, release fewer pollutants and contribute to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is very hardworking individual who believes hard work always pays back.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta  vive con su esposo  y su hijo, ella tiene un negocio de salón de belleza desde hace 10  años en su lugar de residencia trabaja de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm de lunes a sábado tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar. La clienta está solicitando  un crédito para poder comprar productos para su salón de belleza como: cremas, shampoo, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, tintes para el cabello, entre otras cosas que necesita y así podrá obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
The borrower lives with her husband and son, and she has been running a beauty salon in her home for ten years.  She works from 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m., Monday through Saturday, and has a large clientele because of her good work.  With the profits she earns and help from her husband she is able to cover household expenses.

The borrower is requesting a loan to buy beauty salon products, such as conditioner, shampoo, hair pins, scissors, hair color and other items she needs in order to increase her earnings and enjoy more economic stability.

loans.use: To buy conditioner, shampoo, hair pin, scissors, hair color, etc.

loans.name: Bukharibaba Group

texts.en:
Muniguda is a small town of the Rayagada district in Odisha, India, where Padmabati, age about 34 years, resides with her mother. She is a divorcee having two daughters who were married. The lady standing second from left with raised hand in the photograph is Padmabati. 

In the year 2009 she formed a group with three other members of her village to avail loans from Mahashakti Foundation.

Padmabati has been running a small meals hotel for the last eight years. The daily laborers of the locality take lunch in her hotel every day. Apart from that she is also running a general grocery shop as well as stitching leaf plates and selling in the market as an additional business. She earns about INR 7,500 per month from her total business. According to Padmabati this amount is not at all sufficient for her to manage the household expenditures. So she wants to expand her business to earn some extra income.

She has already availed three loans from Mahashakti. This is her fourth loan. From the present loan, she wants to invest some portion in the  hotel, to purchase utensils, rice, etc., and invest some portion in the grocery shop, to purchase soap, oil, dough, washing powder, etc. and also for purchasing leaves to increase the selling of leaf plates. Padmabati has a long desire to have an established meals hotel at Muniguda and bring name and fame in her locality.

The other two members of the group, Sukanti and Ghasiani, are running leaf plate making and selling businesses, and another member, Noorjahan, is doing tailoring and running a fast food stall.

loans.use: to purchase soap, oil, dough, washing powder, etc.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is married and has eight children. She lives in San Jose, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She helps her husband work in the farm during her free time. She is the one attending their children going to school.

 Recently, she joined GDMPC and is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP in order to cover the cost of school tuition fees for her children. She hopes to see her children successful in the near future.

loans.use: to cover the cost of tuition fees for her children

location.town: San Jose, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sack of sugar, five dishes of millet, five dishes of bissap and three dishes of monkey bread.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La Esperanza lleva por nombre este grupo, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y de esa forma conocer la situación que cada una tiene, y de esa forma poder enfocarse y trabajar. Gracias al trabajo que cada una esta haciendo están superando su linea de pobreza. Están ya en su ciclo 7 del programa de mujeres emprendedoras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Daniela, es una mujer con gran potencial e innovadora, desde siempre ha trabajado y lo sigue haciendo para poder ayudar a su familia. Su meta principal es poder ir creciendo por medio de las capacitaciones que esta recibiendo. Ella es modista y solicita de este crédito para la compra de telas ya que la misma se dedica a la confección de ropas, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
“Hope” is the name of this group. The women who are members are making an effort to eliminate poverty, and this requires that they know the situation of each member. In this manner, they can stay focused and work. Thanks to the work that each is doing, they are overcoming their own poverty. The members are now in their 7th loan cycle in the Enterprising Women Program.

Daniela is a member. She is a very innovative woman with great potential. Daniela has always worked as she does now in order to help her family. Her principal goal is to be able to continue growing by means of the training she is receiving.

Daniela is a dressmaker and is requesting a loan to purchase cloth for making clothing. This will help her realize her business plan and, in turn, enable her to improve her income.

loans.use: buy cloth for dressmaking.

loans.name: Rodry

texts.es:
El Sr. Rody  tiene 34 años, casado con la sra Liz, ambos tienen un negocio bien surtido que es una despensa. Ambos estan trabajando para ir mejorando poco a poco y por medio del esfuerzo que estan haciendo.
El crédito será invertido en la compra de frutas y verduras fresca del mercado de abasto de la capital, ya que así podrá seguir ofreciendo insumos de muy buena calidad a sus clientes.                                                                      
Agradece a la fundación paraguaya y kiva por la oportunidad de crédito, por la confianza y el apoyo que le brindan, que gracias a eso cumple con la demanda y exigencia  de sus clientelas .
texts.en:
Mr. Rody is 34 years old, married to his wife Liz and the two share a well supplied grocery business. Both are working to improve their business bit by bit and through hard work. 
The credit will be invested in purchasing fruits and fresh vegetables in the provisions market in the capital; this is how they are able to offer high quality products to their customers. 
They are thankful to the Fundación Paraguaya and to Kiva for the opportunity to receive this loan, for their trust and their support that they have shown. Thanks to this loan they will be able to meet their customers' demands.

loans.use: purchase fruits and fresh vegetables.

loans.name: Leofe

texts.en: Leofe is 31 years old and lives in Resthouse, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Leofe is married and has three children. She plants, harvests and sells corn to earn a living and she's been in this business for more than five years. She requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure and a portion of this loan will be used for repair of her existing motorcycle. She also has had a service-based business providing motor rental in the community as her other source of income. In 2011, Leofe joined GDMPC. In the future, she wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure and repair her existing motorcycle

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гульмира, 37 лет, не замужем. Образование-средне-специальное. Работает медсестрой в местной больнице. В поисках дополнительных доходов Гульмира решила заняться полеводством, начиная с этого года. Гульмира имеет 1,20 ГА земельного надела, где посажена фасоль и клубника. Гульмира хочет и дальше заниматься и развивать полеводство, в связи с этим, обратилась в  микрофинансовый Банк «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом, в сумме 50 000 сом (KGS)  на покупку удобрений и ядохимикатов. На доходы от кредита Гульмира хочет купить автомашину. Гульмира -очень ответственная и добрая, она всегда рада помочь людям, нуждающимся в ее помощи.
texts.en:
Gulmira is 37 years old and is not married. She completed a specialized high school education. She works as a nurse in a local hospital. In search of additional income, Gulmira decided to engage in agriculture, starting from this year. Gulmira has 1.20 hectares of land, where she has planted beans and strawberries. 

Gulmira wants to continue to pursue and develop her crop cultivation, and in this regard turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase fertilizers and pesticides. 

With the proceeds of the loan, Gulmira wants to buy a car. Gulmira is very responsible and kind; she is always happy to help people who need her help.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Bhawanishankar-B Group

texts.en:
Parbati, a young entrepreneur, hails from a small town of Bhawanipatna, the district headquarters of Kalahandi district in Odisha, India. The lady standing at the extreme right with raised hand is Parvati. 

She is 34 years old and lives with her husband and two daughters, age 15 and 12 and one son, 4 years of age.
 
Parbati has had a milk business for the last five years with the active support of her husband. Parbati gets a monthly income of INR 9,000 from the above business. Out of this income she hardly is able to manage her household expenses. 

In the year 2010, Parbati, along with three other women, formed a group named Bhawanishankar-B to avail loans from Mahashakti Foundation to expand their businesses.

Now she wants to expand her business by purchasing two cows with the financial support from Mahashakti. This will be her third loan.

In future, she wants to prepare milk products and supply them to the nearby hotels.

The other three members of the group, Praphul, Prabhasini and Sudeshna, need loans for a betel shop, a tailoring business, and a carpentry business, respectively.

loans.use: to purchase two cows.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en: Rogelio is a married farmer of Taguitic, Kapatagan Lanao del Norte. He operates his garden and rice field to earn a living. In 2008, he joined GDMPC and is now requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer for his farm. He hopes to gain more harvest for better living conditions for the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Baasankhuu

texts.en: Baasankhuu, 27 years old, lives with his wife in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Last year he began rendering taxi service to local people and is quite experienced at picking up customers, driving them quickly and shortening roads. Before the taxi business, he had worked at a petroleum importing company and due to hazardous work conditions he quit his job. Using his previous loan, he has finished building his house and now again he is requesting a loan in order to purchase a low pressure heater which is priced at 2,000,000 MNT. He thinks purchasing a heater will further reduce his coal consumption, which will greatly contribute to the efforts against air pollution as less coal burned means fewer pollutants released into the atmosphere. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who wants a comfortable and warm home before becoming a father.

loans.use: to purchase a low pressure heater

loans.name: Akenese

texts.en:
Akenese is a 39-year-old married woman with one child. She would like to start growing banana trees and taro plants to earn a living. Akenese has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, spade and chemicals. 

She became a member of SPBD in 2013. Akenese will spend her profits to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, spade and chemicals

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
El Señor Fernando a pesar de su corta edad es muy trabajador, comenta que tiene un negocio de agroveterinaria y distribuidor de gaseosas.
Empezó con un pequeño stock de gaseosas, eso le dejó un buen margen de ganancias y se propuso distribuir por la zona, y de esa forma se fue abriendo camino y hoy en día ya tiene muy buena clientela.
El anterior crédito de Kiva lo utilizo para la compra de bebidas, lo cual le ayudo mucho. Hoy solicita de otro crédito y quiere invertirlo en la compra de gaseosas, vinos y demás, para poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
In spite of his young age, Fernando is very hard-working.  He says that he has a veterinary/farm supply business, and he distributes soft drinks.

He started with a little stock of soft drinks.  This gave him a good profit margin, and he set about distributing in the area.  This way the path was opening up for him, and he now has very good clientele.

He used his previous Kiva loan to buy drinks, which helped him a lot.  He is now requesting another loan.  He wants to buy soft drinks, wine, and the rest in order to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, wine, and more.

loans.name: Luz De La Esperanza Group

texts.es: El grupo “LUZ DE LA ESPERANZA” está conformado por socios jóvenes trabajadores y empeñosos. Quienes se encuentran pasando el 07 ciclo. Antony tienes 21 años es soltero trabaja brindando servicios de  mecánico industrial hace mas de un años a las vez estudia mecánica y mantenimiento en un instituto especializado en mantenimientos industriales. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de una herramienta electroportatil. Su mayor deseo es terminar su carrera técnica y lograr su estabilidad laboral. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Antony es el primero del lado derecho. De la misma menar la Sra. Dedamia no pudo estar presente en la reunión por motivos laborales.
texts.en:
The members of the "Luz de la Esperanza" [Light of Hope] group are young, enterprising and hardworking; they are in their seventh loan cycle. Antony is 21 years old and unmarried. He has worked as an industrial mechanic for several years and is also studying mechanics and maintenance at an institute that specializes in industrial maintenance.

Antony will use the loan to invest in a power tool. His biggest goal is to finish his studies and find stable employment. The group thanks Kiva investors for this loan. In the photo, Antony is at the far right, while another member, Dedamia, was not able to be present due to work commitments.

loans.use: PARA COMPRAR UNA HERRAMIENTA ELECTROPORTATIL

loans.name: Mérida Del Consuelo

texts.es: Mérida es una señora de 61 años de edad, soltera, madre de dos hijos, uno de ellos con retraso mental. Es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora ya que desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la producción de empanadas, tamales y yogurt y sale a venderlos de forma ambulante en todo el municipio, lo que le permitió brindarle estudio a su hijo mayor. El crédito será destinado para comprar un activo fijo (nevera) y materias primas para elaborar los productos (verduras, carne, leche, frutas). Su mayor sueño es hacer crecer su negocio hasta el punto de convertirse en una distribuidora de lácteos y empanadas, en compañía de su hija quien depende totalmente de ella debido a su enfermedad.
texts.en:
Mérida is 61 years old, single, and the mother of two children, one of whom is mentally retarded. She is an entrepreneurial and hard-working woman and has been working for a long time making empanadas, tamales, and yoghurt, which she sells in the streets all over the municipality. This has allowed her to send her older son to school. 

The loan will be used for buying a physical asset (refrigerator) and ingredients for making her products (vegetables, meat, milk, fruits). Her biggest dream is to make her business grow until she becomes a distributor of dairy products and empanadas, in the company of her daughter who depends completely on Mérida due to her illness.

loans.use: to buy an asset (refrigerator) and ingredients (vegetables, meat, milk, fruits)

loans.name: Jhony Orlando

texts.es: El señor Jhony, es una persona de 25 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive en concubinato, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, cuenta con un dependiente económico a cargo y vive en casa de sus tíos en calidad de cuidador.  El señor Jhony trabaja como propietario prestando servicios de transporte de pasajeros (taxi) en una empresa de radio móvil. Además cabe mencionar que el señor Jhony con la colaboración de su esposa cuenta con un centro de servicio de café internet en la misma zona donde vive, realiza la atención diariamente, el café internet le permite generar ingresos económicos adicionales y precisamente para incrementar más aun sus ingresos el señor Jhony se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para realizar la compra de 3 computadoras las cuales le permitirán mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Jhony is 25, unmarried, and lives with his partner. He went to elementary school and has one dependent under his care. He lives in his aunt and uncle's home as a caretaker. Jhony offers a passenger transportation service (taxi) for a mobile radio company. It is also worth mentioning that he and his partner have an internet cafe business in their neighbourhood. Jhony works there every day, and it allows him to generate an additional income. So that he can increase his income even more, Jhony finds it necessary to request a loan to invest in the purchase of three computers which will allow him to improve his income.

loans.use: to buy three computers.

loans.name: Gulnar

texts.ru: Гулнар, 48 лет, замужем, имеет 2 детей (2 сына). Гулнар-домохозяйка, старший сын -инвалид, она ухаживает за ним. Несмотря на то, что сын-инвалид, Гулнар не сидит сложа руки, в поисках доходов для своей семьи она начала заниматься разведением скота и обработкой земли, с суммы в 20 000 сом (KGS). Благодаря ее непосильному труду и терпеливому характеру на сегодняшний день она имеет очень хорошее хозяйство: 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец, 2 теленка. Также в наличии имеет 3,0 ГА поливной земли, на которой она ежегодно сажает: клевер, и фасоль. Прибыль позволила Гулнар размножить скот в домашнем хозяйстве и тем самым улучшить семейное благосостояние. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулнар обратилась в «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20 000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы. Доходы от кредита Гулнар планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, а также в будущем планирует женить младшего сына.
texts.en:
Gulnar is 48 years old, married, and has two children (sons). Gulnar is a homemaker. Her eldest son is disabled and she takes care of him. Despite the fact that her son is disabled, Gulnar does not sit idly by. In search of income for her family, she began breeding cattle and cultivating the land, with a sum of 20,000 som (KGS). 

Through her backbreaking labor and patient nature, today she has a very good homestead: two dairy cows, 20 sheep, and two calves. She also has 3.0 hectares of irrigated land, on which annually she plants clover and beans. 

Profits allowed Gulnar to propagate livestock on her homestead and thus to improve the family's well-being. In order to further develop her business, Gulnar turned to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow. 

Gulnar plans to invest income from the loan to further increase the number of livestock, and is planning to put on a wedding for her younger son.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en: Juvy is from Cabgan, Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur. She is single and she sells fish in the community to earn a living. As a single mom, she has to support her two children's needs. She borrowed a loan from GDMPC microcredit in order to buy more fish to sell. She plans to have a fishing boat to be used for her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Las Pampas  (Montecristi) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Las Pampas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

Este es un grupo de 9 mujeres y 3 hombres  que decidieron unirse y formar este grupo de crédito que les ha servido de mucho ya que con los créditos han podido mejorar su nivel de vida y sus negocios, la mayoría de las personas se dedican a realizar trabajos de artesanía más que todo productos de paja toquilla y también uno que otro al comercio en general.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Mercedes Isabel, tiene  28 años, se caso muy joven y de esta relación  tiene 7 hijos de 14, 13, 10, 8, 5 y 3 años y un bebé de 10 meses, los 5 mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es agricultor. 

Doña Mercedes Isabel es artesana y se dedica a la elaboración y venta de sombreros de paja toquilla, trabaja todos los días y esta es una profesión que le encanta ya que además de continuar con una tradición de muchos años también sus sombreros son admirados en muchas partes del Ecuador y del mundo, aprendió esta profesión de sus padres y ella les enseña a sus hijos quienes también le ayudan en esta labor cuando ellos pueden. Los sombreros una vez terminados los venden a comerciantes que llegan a su ciudad a comprar a los artesanos para llevarlos a otras ciudades. Gracias a sus ganancias sus hijos pueden estudiar ya que lo que gana su marido no alcanza para esto. 

Este crédito es para comprar paja toquilla para elaborar sus sombreros. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan para salir adelante. 

Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.

Las fotos pequeñas son de las socias que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Pampas" meets every 15 days in Montecristi, a place known for its rich pre-colonial culture and handicrafts, renowned both nationally and internationally.  The area is also known for its famous Panama hats.

The group is comprised of nine women and three men who decided to join together to form a loan group which has helped the improve their lifestyles and businesses.  Most of the members are involved in craft work, especially items made of straw, and one member works in commerce in general.

One of the members of the group is Mercedes Isabel, 28, who married very young and has seven children, ages 14, 13, 10, 8, 5 and 3, as well as a 10-month old baby.  The eldest five attend school.  Her husband is a farmer.

Mercedes Isabel is an artisan who makes and sells Panama hats.  She works every day and enjoys her profession because it allows her to continue a long-standing tradition.  Her hats are admired in many parts of Ecuador and the rest of the world.  She learned her craft from her parents and she also teaches it to her own children so they can help with her work.  Once the hats are made she sells them to traders who come to the city to buy crafts to sell in other locations.  Thanks to the profits she earns her children are able to study, since her husband's salary is not enough to cover everything.

This loan will be used to buy straw to make the hats.  Mercedes Isabel has been in the loan group since its beginnings and she likes the support she receives toward getting ahead.

Her goal is to give her children the best she can.

The smaller photographs are of the members who could not be present for the group photo.

loans.use: To buy straw.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia tiene 58 años, está casada con Carlos y tiene un hijo con quien vive en su casa propia. Lidia se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, vende este tipo de artículos mediante el sistema de venta por catálogo o exhibición, por está razón tiene una vitrina en su hogar, a donde llegan sus clientes en busca de perfumes, talcos, cremas, desodorantes o algún accesorio de utilidad. Lleva en ésta actividad un promedio de 17 años, trabaja sola y gana muy bien. Alterna esta actividad eventualmente con la venta de productos de limpieza como detergentes, lejías, cremas dentales y otros. Por lo pronto, continúa trabajando en la venta de cosméticos y le gusta lo que hace, sus ganancias están aseguradas con los clientes que ya ha logrado consolidar con el paso de los años, está muy contenta por la independencia que tiene y porque puede generar ella misma sus propios ingresos para solventar los gastos necesarios en su hogar, además espera seguir trabajando y expandir su negocio para continuar progresando ya que desea brindarle lo mejor a su hijo. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero que le permita seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará principalmente cosméticos como talcos, cremas, perfumes y otros accesorios.
texts.en:
Lidia is 58 years old and married to Carlos, they have one child and live in the house they own. Lidia works selling cosmetics by catalog or by product display. For this purpose she has a showcase in her home where her clients come to find perfumes, talc, lotions, deodorants, or some toiletry. 

She has been running this business for about 17 years, she works alone and earns very well. She sometimes alternates this activity with the selling of cleaning products such as detergent, bleach, toothpaste, etc. For now she continues working with cosmetic sales and she likes what she does. Her income is guaranteed by the clientele she has managed to consolidate over the years, and she is very pleased with the independency she has because she can generate her own income to pay for the household expenses. She hopes to continue working and to make her business grow so that she can offer the best for her son.

This time she is applying for 1500 PEN, she is very happy to know that she will be receiving financial support that allows her to move forward, and she pledges to make her repayments on time. She will use the requested loan primarily to buy cosmetics such as talc, lotions, perfumes, and other toiletries.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as talc, lotions, perfumes, and other toiletries

loans.name: July

texts.es:
July tiene 21 años, es soltera y vive alado de su madre en su casa propia. July se dedica a la venta de pescado. Tiene su puesto de ventas que comparte con su madre que está ubicado en uno de los mercados. Diariamente se levanta muy temprano y se dirige al puerto para comprar al por mayor sus productos. Selecciona aquellas especies que tienen mayor demanda entre sus clientes respetando siempre las etapas de veda. Compra por canastas al por mayor y los vende por kilos. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 2 años aproximadamente y aprendió gracias a su mamá. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo por las tardes para descansar en su casa y realizar otras funciones, además siempre fue independiente y se acostumbró a valerse por sí misma, espera mantener el mismo ritmo laboral y continuar trabajando por mucho más tiempo. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500, agradece a quienes le brindan el préstamo para seguir desarrollando su negocio, está convencida que seguirá siendo una cliente muy puntual y pagará sus cuotas a tiempo como antes.
Con el monto solicitado comprará pescados de gran demanda entre sus clientes en mayor cantidad ya que en esta temporada el consumo de ciertas especies se incrementa.
texts.en:
July, age 21, is single.  She lives alongside her mother in her own house. July sells fish.  She has her sales stand, which she shares with her mother, at one of the markets.  She gets up early every day and heads to the port to buy her products wholesale.  She selects the types of fish that have the greatest demand among her customers.  She always respects regulations regarding the season during which each fish can be caught. She buys her fish wholesale by the basket and sells it by the kilogram.  She has been doing this work for approximately two years.  She learned thanks to her mother.

What she likes about her work is that she has time in the evenings to rest at home and to do other tasks.  Also, she was always independent, and she got used to standing on her own two feet.  She hopes to maintain the same work pace and to continue working for a lot more time.

She will now request 500 soles.  She is grateful to those who provide her with the loan in order to continue developing her business.  She is sure that she will continue to be a very punctual client, and she will make her payments on time as she has done before.

She will use the requested loan to buy fish that is in great demand by her customers.  She will buy in greater quantities because during this season consumption of certain types is increasing.

loans.use: to buy fish that is in great demand for her fish selling business.

loans.name: Lkhagvajav

texts.en:
Mr. Lkhagvajav, 40 years old, lives with his parents in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. He, together with a few of his friends, has recently began running a taxi service company. He has a position of internal auditor at a taxi company. His parents both have retired from work and now get a state pension. Currently he is building a brick house on his land to prepare for his upcoming marriage. The roofing and installing windows and door as well as interior decoration remain due to lack of finances. 

According to his own calculations, building a new house on his old home's foundation has several advantages: in winter time, the old house was losing all its heat through walls and windows and more space will be needed in the near future as he gets married and becomes a father. So he is requesting a loan of 5,000,000 MNT to purchase vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors, fiberglass, shingles and foam for house building. The high quality new house will reduce the family's coal consumption greatly as Mongolians usually use coal for heating. Burning less coal will contribute to the efforts against air pollution as it will release less pollutant into the atmosphere.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Las Rosas De San Antonio Group

texts.es:
Las Rosas de San antonio es un Grupo nuevo, que con mucho entusiasmo esta trabajando para poder salir adelante. Son 17 mujeres con muchas ansias de crecer, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, como medio para conocer la situación de cada una, de las cuales 3 están por debajo de la linea de pobreza, es decir, en nivel rojo con ingresos muy bajos.
Blanca es parte de este grupo, en su ultima encuesta estuvo en un nivel rojo, es decir, con ingresos básicos mínimos. Hoy ella esta trabajando el doble para mejorar su vida y la de su familia, y como medio de lucha se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas, como ser pantalones, remeras, camisas, capuchas, abrigos y demás. Ella y sus compañeras están felices por esta oportunidad que reciben.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Rosas de San Antonio" is a new group which is working very enthusiastically to get ahead.  The 17 women members are excited to grow.  They are participating in a poverty elimination survey to determine each one's situation, and three of the members appear to be below the poverty line with very low incomes.

Blanca is one of the group members below the poverty line and she has a minimal basic income.  Nowadays she is working double time to improve her and her family's lifestyle.  She earns a living selling all kinds of clothing.

She is requesting a loan to buy a variety of clothing, such as pants, shorts, shirts, hoodies, coats, etc.  Blanca and her colleagues are grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: To buy clothing such as pants, shorts, shirts, hoodies, coats and other items.

loans.name: Ventanilla Alta 2 Group

texts.es:
Este es el grupo Ventanilla Alta
Margot de 27 años es la presidenta del grupo y lo conforman 07 socias. Margot es casada y tiene 02 hijos pequeños. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, empezó este negocio para  colaborar con los ingresos del hogar y ayudar a su esposo que es pintor, su trabajo es independiente y le permite acomodar sus tiempos sin descuidar a sus hijos. Margot tiene muchas clientas a quienes les ofrece ropa de buena calidad y les brinda facilidad de pago, en esta oportunidad el dinero de su préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de ropa de invierno que sus clientas le han solicitado, mas adelante le gustaría alquilar un puesto en algún mercado para instalar su negocio de esa manera obtendría más ingresos. Margot es la que viste casaca deportiva color azul con blanca y pantalon jean.
* la foto pequeña pertenece a una de las socias Karla.
texts.en:
This is the “Ventanilla Alta” group.  Margot, 27, is group president and the group has 7 members.  Margot is married and has two small children.  She works selling clothes.  She started this business to help cover household expenses and help her husband who is a painter.  Her work is independent which allows her to manage her time so as not to neglect her children.

Margot has many customers that she sells quality clothes to and to whom she offers easy payment terms.  On this occasion she will use the money from her loan to buy winter clothes her customers have requested.  Later on she’d like to rent a stand in some market to set up her business in order to earn higher income this way.  Margot is wearing the blue and white sports jacket and jeans trousers.

The small picture is of one of the other borrowers, Karla.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 63 years old, married, and has four children. She lives in Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates farmland, planting and harvesting coconuts for sale. She also has had a farm for planting and harvesting rice for sale.

She has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2007, and now she has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP. She will use the loan to purchase fertilizer and cover labor costs . She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and cover labour costs

loans.name: Deutelina

texts.es: Deutelina de 43 años de edad vive con su hijo de 13 años, se dedica al negocio de confeccionar ropa; produciendo, blusas, pantalones, vestidos y faldas para mujeres. Vive en el popular municipio de Soledad del departamento del Atlántico, Costa Norte de Colombia. Su negocio lo inició desde el año 1996, es decir, hace 17 años. Su idea del negocio la estudió bien, y se dio cuenta que era productivo montar el taller de confecciones, que le daría buena rentabilidad, diseñar sus propias prendas de vestir, confeccionarlas y venderlas a la medida del gusto de los clientes. También fabrica prendas de vestir en cadena. Su mercado de  clientes está conformado principalmente por almacenes, y vecinos del sector donde vive. Comercializa sus productos ofreciéndolos a clientes reales y potenciales con mostrarios, es decir prendas que usa de modelos para que los clientes aprecien y se decidan a realizar sus pedidos. Su horario de trabajo es 7:30 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. Este es su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, el cual lo aplicará en la compra de hilos, telas, y una máquina plana, para mejorar el servicio y la calidad de las prendas confeccionadas. Sus metas son: Aumentar la clientela actual y seguir mejorando su calidad de vida, y la de su hijo.
texts.en: Deutelina, 43, lives with her 13-year-old son.  She works making clothes producing blouses, pants, dresses and skirts for women.  She lives in the popular municipality of Soledad in Atlántico Department, North Coast of Colombia.  She started her business in 1996, that is, 17 years ago.  She studied her business idea well and realized that setting up a sewing workshop would be productive; that designing, making and selling her clothes to customer order would be profitable.  She also mass produces clothes.  Her customer market consists mainly of stores and local neighbors.  She sells her products to actual and potential customers showing them samples, that is, items she uses as models so the customer can appreciate them and decide on what to order.  She works from 7:30am until 6pm.  This is her first Kiva loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that she’ll use to buy thread, fabric and a sewing machine to improve service and quality of items made.  Her goals are to: increase clientele and to continue improving her and her son’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Elmer

texts.en: Elmer lives in Inroad, Aurora, Zamboanag del Sur where he provides a service-based business of motor transport in the community. He is married and has six children that need his support. In 2007, he became a member of GDMPC and recently, he borrowed a loan of 10,000 PHP to repair his existing motorcycle. He plans to buy a sidecar to improve his services.

loans.use: to repair his existing motorcycle

loans.name: Santa Ana Group

texts.es:
Santa Ana es un grupo formado en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, tiene 16 integrantes, y ellas estan el el cuarto ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres de la fundación Paraguaya. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para conocer la situación de cada una, donde 7 mujeres estan con ingresos muy bajos y luchando por salir adelante.
Una de ellas es Silvia, quien por medio de la venta de cosméticos, y su trabajo del día a día esta ayudando a su familia, es una persona que desde siempre trabajo y por medio de ese trabajo se abrió camino. Su sueño es poder llegar a ser un microempresaria independiente y seguir ayudando a su familia.
Solicita de esta ayuda para poder invertirla en la compra de cosméticos de distintas marcas, lo que también la ayudará a seguir con sus ventas y mejorando su linea de pobreza.
texts.en:
Santa Ana is a group that was formed in the city of  San Lorenzo. It has 16 members and they are in their fourth cycle of the program of the women's committee of the Fundación Paraguaya. They are doing the poverty elimination survey to know each of their situations, and 7 women have very low income and are fighting to get ahead. 

One of them is Silvia, who through selling cosmetics and working day to day is helping her family. She is a person who has always worked and through her work has made her way. Her dream is to be able to become an independent micro-businesswoman and keep helping her family. 

She is asking for this help to be able to invest it in buying different brands of cosmetics, which will also help her to keep making her sales and improving her conditions of poverty.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es:
San Isidro se forma con la esperanza de que todas las integrantes puedan ayudar a sus familias. Este grupo esta en su ciclo sexto. Ellas son mujeres jefas de familia que estan haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para poder superar sus limitaciones e ir creciendo, y mejorar la pobreza de todas.
Una de estas mujeres y ejemplo de trabajo es Irene, quien se dedica a la venta de comestibles. Ella cuenta que ya tiene muy buena clientela, ya que sus comidas son muy ricas y sus clientes siempre le piden. Cuenta también que al principio le costo abrirse camino, pero que después poco a poco fue creciendo.
Hoy solicita de este crédito para poder comprar carne, verduras, condimentos y demás insumos para poder segur haciendo sus alimentos y seguir creciendo día a día.
texts.en:
San Isidro communal bank was formed with the hope that all the members would be able to help their families.  The group is in its sixth funding cycle.  The woman are heads of their households and are doing the poverty elimination survey to help overcome their limitations, to keep growing and to improve all of their levels of poverty. 
One of these women, and an example of the work they do, is Irene.  She makes her living selling food.  She says that she has a very good clientele, as the food she makes is quite delicious and much requested.  She also says that at the beginning, it was hard to break into the business.  But the business soon started growing, little by little. 
Today Irene is requesting the loan in order to purchase meat, vegetables, condiments and other supplies for making the food she sells.  It will also help her business to grow each day.

loans.use: to purchase meat, vegetables, condiments and other supplies.

loans.name: Blacida

texts.es:
Blasida es estudiante de notariado en una de las universidades más prestigiosas del país, ella está casada y tiene un hijo, quien es su motivo de lucha y a quien quiere ayudar a tener un futuro digno.
Su meta es terminar su carrera y poder ejercer la profesión. Aspira a ser una profesional y desempeñarme como tal en esa área para poder ayudar dentro de la familia y lograr crecer con ella.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de la universidad, para que de esa forma siga estudiando y no tener que preocuparse. Esta muy agradecida por esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
Blasida is studying to become a notary at one of the country’s most prestigious universities.  She’s married and has a son who is the motivator for her to strive and who she wants to help have a proper future. 

Her goal is to finish her career and be able to practice her profession.  She relates that she hopes to become a professional and develop as such in that area to be able to help within the family and manage to grow with it.

She requests this loan to pay university tuition fees so that she can continue studying worry-free.  She’s very grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité “San Cayetano” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la comunidad de  Itacurubí del Rosario, ciudad del Santaní, es una compañía alejada y con escasos medios de acceso. Es una comunidad en crecimiento y que lucha por mejorar.
La señora Elba, es una de las integrantes, ella cuenta con una Despensa en donde invierte todo lo que tiene, y de esa forma poder ayudar a su familia. Empezó con un pequeño negocio y poco a poco y gracias al esfuerzo está saliendo adelante. Su meta es poder seguir trabajando y ayudando a su familia como lo viene haciendo.
Solicita de este crédito ya que quiere surtir su negocio con los insumos de primera necesidad que es lo que mas llevan sus clientes, como ser leche, pan, carne, bebidas y verduras. Agradece por esta ayuda que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
The “San Cayetano” committee was formed when several neighbors got together in the community of Itacurubí del Rosario, city of Santaní. It is a remote community with few means of access. It is a community that is growing and fighting to improve.   

Elba is one of the members. She has a small store where she invests everything she has and in this way helps her family. She started with a small business and little by little, thanks to her hard work, is getting ahead. Her goal is to keep working and helping her family as she has done. 

She is asking for this loan because she wants to stock her business with staple products that her customers buy the most, such as milk, bread, meat, beverages and vegetables. She is grateful for the help she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy milk, bread, meat, beverages, and vegetables

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 20 years old and married with three children.

She has a small garden where she grows taro, which she sells in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 3 years. Maria needs a loan to buy bush knives, chemicals, backpack sprayer, pickaxe, wheelbarrow, spade, and file for her business.

Maria has been a member of SPBD since 2011. She will use the profits from her sales to support her family and her childrens' educations.

loans.use: to buy bush knives, chemicals, backpack sprayer, pick axe, wheelbarrow, spade, and file.

loans.name: La Victoria Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado La Victoria  está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de CONCEPCION, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Angelina es una de las integrantes, ella es de una zona muy alejada del centro mismo de la ciudad donde tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de reciclaje, la cual  sale también a vender en otros lugares sus productos, en un carrito de reciclaje. Desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de la ayuda de todas las personas de su zona puedan ir mejorando su entorno y así ofrecer una mayor seguridad a sus familias, también poder procurar para ellos un mejor futuro.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de ingredientes para poder hacer también alimentos y poder venderlos y tener un ingreso extra. Y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
The La Victoria group is in its third cycle of the women’s committee program in the city of Concepción.  This is an area a bit away from the central zone, and it is still growing.  The area is difficult to access.  That is why the members of this group want to carry on in order to grow and to give the area where they live a better environment.  They want to continue slowly growing.

Angelina is one of the members.  She is from an area that is very far from the center of the city where she has her small business of selling recyclables.  She also goes out to sell her products in other places in a cart with recyclables.  She wishes that, as time passes, and with the help of the people in her area, they will improve their environment and provide their families with greater security and a better future.

She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients in order to be able to also make food and be able to sell it and have an extra income.   This way she will be able to continue growing with her business.  She will also be able to give her family what they need in order to have a life without deprivations.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, vegetables, condiments, flour, salt, and others in order to make food.

loans.name: Clemencia

texts.es:
La Señora Clemencia tiene una despensa hace mas de 10 años, es una cliente excelente que gracias a la ayuda que le brinda la fundación paraguaya pudo ir creciendo en su negocio con la cual mantiene a su familia y les da todo lo que necesitan y que no tengan que pasar por ningún tipo de privaciones.
Su perimer crédito de Kiva lo utilizó en la compra de insumos para su despensa, hoy solicita de nuevo otro crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas, verduras, arroz, azúcar, fideos, y demás productos de primera necesidad para seguir trabajando. Agradece esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en: Clemencia has had a grocery store for more than 10 years. She is an excellent client who has been able to continue growing her business thanks to the help which the Fundación Paraguaya gives her. Thus she is able to look after her family and gives them everything they need so they do not suffer any hardship. She used her first Kiva loan to buy supplies for her grocery store. Today she is asking for another loan to be able to buy fruit, vegetables, rice, sugar, noodles and other grocery essentials so she can continue working. She is grateful for the new opportunity she is being given.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, rice, sugar, noodles and other products.

loans.name: Rosario Paulina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Guillermo Balda se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Rosario, tiene 41 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, dos  de ellos  ya son mayores de edad y una niña que es hija de crianza de 6 años que estudia en escuela y es la única que aún vive con ella. Su esposo es artesano.

Doña Rosario tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí  además de víveres también vende frutas, legumbres, artículos de papelería y de bazar, trabaja todos los días desde la madrugada ya que a esa hora llegan sus clientes a comprar productos para el consumo del día, ella a ciertos clientes de confianza les deja a crédito hasta la quincena o fin de mes que ellos cobran, con esto  gana más clientela y sus ventas cada vez mejoran mas, tiene más de 5 años con su negocio el cual le deja muy buenas satisfacciones ya que allí ella se gana algo sin salir de su casa.

Este crédito es para surtir aún más su tienda y su papelería, va a comprar víveres y útiles escolares. Lleva 5 ciclos en el  Banco Comunal y le gusta por los beneficios y ayuda que le brinda la institución.
 
Su sueño es seguir aumentando su negocio.
texts.en:
The Guillermo Balda community bank meets every two weeks in the Montecristi canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its nationally and internationally known crafts.  It is also the place where the famous Panama hats are from.

Rosario is 41 years old, married, and has three children.  Two of them are adults and her youngest daughter is 6 years old, goes to school, and is the only one who lives with her.  Her husband is an artisan.

Rosario has a small general store in her home where she sells food items as well as fruits, legumes, stationary products, and housewares.  She works every day starting at dawn, since that is the time her customers come to buy products to consume that day.  She gives credit to certain trusted customers until the 15th or end of the month.  This earns her more customers and her sales always improve.  She has had this business for more than five years and she is very satisfied with it since she is able to earn money without leaving home.

She is requesting this loan to increase stock in her store, so she will purchase food items and school supplies.  This is her fifth loan with the community bank and she likes it for the benefits and help that the institution provides.  

Her dream is to continue expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase food items and school supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase his inventory of pants to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her stock of fruit & vegetables.

loans.name: Perpetuo Socorro Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de jóvenes es de la ciudad de Luque Son 5 jóvenes que se unieron con el objetivo de poder empezar a trabajar y salir adelante para ayudar a sus familias. Ellos están muy entusiasmados ya que podrán ayudar con los ingresos de la casa, y de esa forma poder sentirse útiles.
Uno de estos jóvenes es Ariel, quien tiene 16 años, cuenta que está trabajando en cocinar pollos y asados para distinto tipo de eventos en los que ayuda a su abuelo. El es un joven de muy buena familia, todos son muy trabajadores, y quiere poder seguir el ejemplo que sus papas le dieron, y de esa forma poder ayudarles y que se sientan orgullosos de él.
Pide de este crédito para la compra de libros para sus estudios, lo que le ayudara para poder seguir creciendo y educándose.
En la foto del grupo aparecen mas personas ya que en el mismo estan los jóvenes con sus padres, quienes son sus codeudores que también firman en el contrato.
texts.en:
This group of young people is from the city of Luque. These five young people have joined together so that they can begin working and moving forward in order to help their families. They are very excited about being able to help with the household income since this will make them feel useful.

One of these young individuals is Ariel. He is 16 years old and has a job preparing roasted chickens for different events with the help of his grandfather. This young man is from a very good family in which everyone works hard. Ariel continues to follow the example that his parents have set for him, which allows him to be helpful. His parents are very proud of him.

Ariel is requesting a loan so that he can buy books for his studies. This will help him to continue growing and learning.
